page.title: 07Employment and Travel
page.content: We asked 20 people to answer our survey.Most people had an occupation and it was full-time.A lot of people were employed by others,but there were two who were self employed.The self employed people employed 2to3 people at a time.Most of the people worked at a public service but four were commercial and two involved in transport.People's positions were mostly skilled and managerial and 3 were semi skilled.Most people travelled to work by car.The range of miles travelled was from 1M,to 360 miles.
